message: I was wondering why connecting my account to Facebook asks for the permission to access my account even when I'm online?
also what information is shared with Facebook?
has to do with the access permission - they should request "offline_access" permission
we had this issue with our facebook app

thanksf or the replies.  the privacy statement says "Convore discloses potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information only to those of its employees, contractors and affiliated organizations that (i) need to know that information in order to process it on Convore's behalf or to provide services available at Convore's websites, and (ii) that have agreed not to disclose it to others." which could easily mean that they share everything with Facebook -- or not, as the case may be.
